attributes.action: Reverse the move to put calorie content next to items on menus
attributes.additional_details: Seeing calorie content can be very triggering for people struggling with disordered eating, and in recovery patients are told to avoid counting calories- this move makes this practically impossible. There could be other options such as a QR code to view calories.
attributes.background: Reverse the move to include calorie content next to menu items in recognition of the impact this will have on mental health
